docs.title: Welcome to a site dedicated to DNS
docs.text:
This site is accessible via domainnamesystem.info and hosted on github pages.

I have worked as a Product Owner for DNS for the last 5 years and although a lot of information is available on Internet around DNS, it is spread across the web. This site will serve as a digital garden.

docs.title: Welcome to a site dedicated to DNS aka Domain Name System
docs.text: This site is accessbile via domainnamesystem.info, hosted on github pages.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
